flawed_nl_solution:
Rachel has 1500 - 135 - 141 envelopes = <<1500-135-141=1242>>1242 envelopes remaining to stuff.
Rachel has 8 hours - 2 hours = <<8-2=6>>6 hours left to finish the task.
Rachel needs to stuff 1242 envelopes / 6 hours = <<1242/6=207>>207 envelopes per hour.
#### 207

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1224, not 1242. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
